statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -8 \\ 28 \\ -3 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 18 \\ -68 \\ 8 \\ -23 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -40 \\ 136 \\ -14 \\ 36 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 32 \\ -132 \\ 17 \\ -52 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
